titles.title: To eliminate lead-based pipe and tap hazards in housing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
